mapper.select: SELECT * from tbl_user JOIN user_like using(like_id) ORDER BY user_name

SELECT u.user_seq, u.user_name, u.user_birth, u.user_id, u.user_tel, u.user_email, u.user_addr, u.user_addr_info, lk.like_like, u.user_pass, COUNT(CASE WHEN loan_return - loan_ex > 0 THEN user_pass END) AS count FROM tbl_user u LEFT JOIN user_loan ul ON u.user_seq = ul.user_seq LEFT JOIN user_like lk ON u.like_id = lk.like_id WHERE u.user_seq = #{user_seq} GROUP BY u.user_seq, u.user_name, u.user_birth, u.user_id, u.user_tel, u.user_email, u.user_addr, u.user_addr_info, lk.like_like, u.user_pass
